entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
